title: About
content:
The Suriname Running Collective is a platform for runners in Suriname to connect and share their passion for running. Our platform serves as a hub for all active running groups and running-related activities in Suriname, providing a central location for runners to find and join running groups, discover upcoming events, and stay up-to-date on the latest happenings in the Suriname running community.


Whether youâ€™re living in Suriname or just visiting, you're a seasoned runner or just starting out, the Suriname Running Collective is the perfect place to connect and find like-minded individuals and participate in a variety of running activities.

From group runs, to races and other events, there's something for everyone on our website. We also (co-)host group runs and events to bring runners together and promote running in Suriname.
